title: NYT Praises Anti-semitic opera 'The Death of Klinghoffer'
title_page: Blog: NYT Praises Anti-semitic opera 'The Death of Klinghoffer'
text: If everything goes as planned, the New York Metropolitan Opera will stage the anti-Semitic, anti-Israel opera â€œThe Death of Klinghoffer,â€ starting Monday, Oct. 20. The opera, which has drawn an outpouring of massive protests, is based on an all-too-real episode -- the 1985 hijacking of the cruise ship Achille Lauro by terrorists of the Palestine Liberation Front. The terrorists shot and killed Leon Klinghoffer, a wheelchair-bound passenger, and threw him into the sea. John Adamsâ€™s opera, however, turns the story upside down so that it becomes a vehicle for humanizing terrorist killers and vilifying Jews and Israelis. For example, an Arab chorus blames the 1948 founding of modern Israel as the source of all regional mishaps.
